DataElement.preferredName: MBSImP Component 9 Anterior Hyoid Excursion Score
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Numeric score for the assessment of anterior hyoid excursion in the pharyngeal impairment section of the Modified Barium Swallow Impairment Profile.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Modified Barium Swallow Impairment Profile Pharyngeal Impairment During Swallowing Impairment of Anterior Hyoid Excursion
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: An evidence-based, standardization of the Modified Barium Swallow Study in adults. The protocol assesses 17 critical components of swallowing and provides an objective profile of the physiologic impairment affecting adult swallowing function._An assessment of an individual's pharyngeal impairment during swallowing._An observation of an individual's anterior hyoid excursion during swallowing.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: An evidence-based, standardization of the Modified Barium Swallow Study in adults. The protocol assesses 17 critical components of swallowing and provides an objective profile of the physiologic impairment affecting adult swallowing function.

Concepts.definition: An evidence-based, standardization of the Modified Barium Swallow Study in adults. The protocol assesses 17 critical components of swallowing and provides an objective profile of the physiologic impairment affecting adult swallowing function.

Property.preferredName: Pharyngeal Impairment During Swallowing Impairment of Anterior Hyoid Excursion
Property.preferredDefinition: An assessment of an individual's pharyngeal impairment during swallowing.:An observation of an individual's anterior hyoid excursion during swallowing.

Concepts.definition: An assessment of an individual's pharyngeal impairment during swallowing.
An observation of an individual's anterior hyoid excursion during swallowing.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

DataElementConcept.origin: MBSImP:Modified Barium Swallow Impairment Profile, Martin-Harris et al., 2008
DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Created for Princess Margaret study in Rave as requested by D.Lawrence. mc 6/8/16

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A finding of no anterior movement of hyoid during swallowing.

Concepts.longName: No Anterior Movement of Hyoid During Swallowing
Concepts.definition: A finding of no anterior movement of hyoid during swallowing.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A finding of partial anterior movement of hyoid during swallowing.

Concepts.longName: Partial Anterior Movement of Hyoid During Swallowing
Concepts.definition: A finding of partial anterior movement of hyoid during swallowing.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A finding of complete anterior movement of hyoid during swallowing.

Concepts.longName: Complete Anterior Movement of Hyoid During Swallowing
Concepts.definition: A finding of complete anterior movement of hyoid during swallowing.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.
